definition: generally speaking/to sum up/in summary/in short
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

sentences.english: Overall, the students can not be blindly Starchaser.
sentences.chinese: 總的來說，中學生不能盲目追星。

sentences.english: But overall, being raw just works for me.
sentences.chinese: 但是總的來說，我只是很適合成爲生食者。

sentences.english: In sum, few people remain at subsistence level.
sentences.chinese: 總的來說，很少人一直掙扎在溫飽水平。

sentences.english: On the whole it's a good plan and we shouldn't nitpick .
sentences.chinese: 總的來說，這個計劃是好的，我們不應過於挑剔。

sentences.english: Savings in the aggregate are on the rise.
sentences.chinese: 儲蓄額總的來說處於上升趨勢。

sentences.english: In general , Scotland is colder throughout the year .
sentences.chinese: 總的來說，蘇格蘭全年較冷。

sentences.english: In general, the topic of hyper sclability can be challenging to address.
sentences.chinese: 總的來說，超級可伸縮性是一個極具挑戰性的主題。

sentences.english: There are many children and adolescents whose behavior is gener-ally unacceptable.
sentences.chinese: 很多兒童和青少年的舉止總的來說不可接受。

sentences.english: In general, I would say, it's hard.
On the whole, it's well architected and remarkably flexible.
sentences.chinese: 總的來說，它有良好的架構和顯著的靈活性。

sentences.english: Yet by and large, the EITC helps only families with children.
sentences.chinese: 然而，總的來說，EITC只幫助有兒童的家庭。

sentences.english: So generally, I'm pretty satisfied with the app.
sentences.chinese: 所以總的來說，我對這個應用十分滿意。

sentences.english: In general, I wouldn't worry about the effect of statins on memory.
sentences.chinese: 總的來說，我不會擔心司他汀對記憶力的影響。

sentences.english: In general, breeding density should not big.
sentences.chinese: 總的來說，飼養密度宜小不宜大。

sentences.english: In a general sense, accuracy means correctness, truth, and exactitude.
sentences.chinese: 總的來說，精準就是指正確，真實，以及精確。

sentences.english: Generally speaking, I take charge of the daily administration responsibilities in the office.
sentences.chinese: 總的來說，我主要是負責辦事處的日常行政管理事務。

definition: only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
varying from person to person (idiom); different for each individual
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
that's right/sure!/rest assured!/that's good/can't go wrong
